text:
Edamulackal is a village in Kollam district in the state of Kerala, India. Edamulackal is situated near the second fastest growing town of Kerala, Anchal, the village, still retaining all the natural and scenic beauty of a typical Kerala village, is developing fast in education and service sectors too. The greeny slightly uneven terrain supports a wide range of agricultural activities, supported by the waters of Ithikkara river.
Demographics.
India census, Edamulackal had a population of 22142 with 10586 males and 11556 females.
